post.text: This is big—we just launched a one-of-a-kind mobile app, and you get to be one of the first to try it! Download it today to complete your daily challenges, collect stars, and decorate your own digital campaign headquarters. Test your knowledge and see how you stack up against friends and supporters across the country—all while doing your part to help elect Hillary: http://apple.co/2aEvUwU

comment.author: Chloe
comment.text: Am I the only one who is waiting for a statement from Hillary Clinton that says, "At this point, what difference does it make?!"

replies.author: Chayce
replies.text: Well maybe when she has her press conference she will address this...oh wait...I forgot...she doesn't do those. She can't be bothered to answer questions from the peons!

replies.author: Chloe
replies.text: When she sends it out in an email, the entire world will know it.

replies.author: Rachel
replies.text: Ha ha...now that's funny right there Chloe
